channel.title: I Cant Decide
channel.description:
For any faggot who is going to rant me saying i cant even play an instrument. My comunitty has award winning orchestra and band class that is a requirement to take. proof: http://www.boardman.k12.oh.us/bdcm/BCMSindex2.htm
Me and my friends are making a band... Don't ask why... B/c i don't know. And we cannot decide on a name.And Since im buying the domain (dont ask why) Im probably choosing the name. So people please vote. I cannot decide. If your going to ask what kind, Metal of course stupids.

item.title: I Cant Decide
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

x0 0wn:

Or, The weak shall perish

There’s already a band called “All shall perish”.

Read full topic

item.title: I Cant Decide
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Depends on what kind of metal. Normandi is fail, because Normandy is in France, and you are from the US. Thickblood sounds a bit like black/death metal. And Vorge sounds cool for a Scandinavian black/folk metal band. Vurge… well I don’t know how to pronounce that, but if it’s pronounced like urge + a V it sucks.

So yea, say what kind of metal it is

Read full topic

item.title: I Cant Decide
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Metal Band Names…
Hmm…

The Un-Named
Or The Nameless
Or, The weak shall perish
I’ll make a list ^^

Aces of Death
Axe of Eternity
To Hell and Back
…
I cba to make anymore ^^

Read full topic

item.title: I Cant Decide
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I’m in a punk rock band and we are called Bluntcunt and the GreenGreens.

I don’t really know what metal bands call themselves. How about “Berserker”?

item.title: I Cant Decide
item.dc:creator: @Vermillion1 Vermillion™
item.description:
@Vermillion1 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:10, topic:157873”][quote author=XxKanexX link=topic=215198.msg1877593#msg1877593 date=1194619379]

i’d be willing tobet that none of your friends or you know how to play any instruments yet and your deciding your look and name before the actual music and style comes out.
[/quote]Actually yes. unlike most schools across the US our comunity has award winning band & orchestra classes. That you are required to take. proof:http://www.boardman.k12.oh.us/bdcm/BCMSindex2.htm

Doesn’t mean your good.
But, w/e.

“I hate them all” is an interesting band name.

That name sounds way too Metalcore/Nu-Metal/Hardcore/Screamo. Too bad i’m not very good with names.[/quote]

Ugh… “I hate them all” Means i hate all of those band names…

Read full topic
